duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform chemical and physical tests based on industry standards.
Assist with equipment calibration, maintenance, and troubleshooting.
Clean glassware and test equipment, and prepare reagents as needed.
Record and report data to LIMS system, and maintain quality records and lab supply inventories.
Comply with safety, quality, and housekeeping requirements, and participate in cross-training as needed.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or GED preferred, and successful completion of at least one semester of college-level chemistry or prior work experience in a laboratory environment.
